channel.title: Help plz
channel.description: hi how do i edit my client.java when i try to deletes some stuff or add it wont let me whats the problem? i remeber ther was a program to read client.java and i was able to edit it but i forgot if anyone any knows any program like that plz tell me

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

I’d recommend Notepad++ for quick edits.

And just delete the text you want to delete, then add your own. Just like you’d edit any other file.

And btw, if it doesn’t compile, it’s because you screwed up adding a ‘tut’.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“sigex, post:4, topic:158506”]when you say “wont let me” what do you mean dose nothing when you try to test it, or dose not complie… if it dose nothing when you test it then… you not at a value its requesting…

add

sendMessage(“past part 1”); 2 and 3 so on to see how far you can get though the code before it stops you

if(bla) {
sendMessage(“past part 1”);
if(bla2) {
sendMessage("past part 2);
}
}

if it dont make it past part 2 then you know that bla2 is not the same as your players set bla to w.e the value bla 2 maybe…

or if it reports errors when compling then your a bit of an adiot…[/quote]

IMO, your an “adiot”… I bet he doesn’t even know what your on about.

if(bla) { sendMessage("past part 1"); if(bla2) { sendMessage("past part 2); } }

What the hell has that got to do with editting client.java … He said he can’t edit the file, not help on adding a sendMessage.

Adiot…

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @sigex sigex
item.description:
@sigex wrote:

when you say “wont let me” what do you mean dose nothing when you try to test it, or dose not complie… if it dose nothing when you test it then… you not at a value its requesting…

add

sendMessage(“past part 1”); 2 and 3 so on to see how far you can get though the code before it stops you

if(bla) {
sendMessage(“past part 1”);
if(bla2) {
sendMessage("past part 2);
}
}

if it dont make it past part 2 then you know that bla2 is not the same as your players set bla to w.e the value bla 2 maybe…

or if it reports errors when compling then your a bit of an adiot…
